name: ampel360-framework-generator
description: TypeScript framework structure generator for AMPEL360 Hâ‚‚-BWB-Q

scripts.generate: npm run build && node dist/index.js > ampel360-framework.json 2>&1
scripts.generate-json: npm run build && node -e "const {generateFrameworkStructure,frameworkToJSON}=require('./dist/lib');const fs=require('fs');const framework=generateFrameworkStructure('','','','','',[], {includeFolders:true,includeDescriptions:true});fs.writeFileSync('ampel360-framework-clean.json', frameworkToJSON(framework));"

author: AMPEL360 Team
